page.title: 05Home Life
page.content:
(by seven-year old from Woolaston)
One Monday in the life of my family. My name is Melanie Mayo. There are 5 people in my family, my Daddy, Keith,my Mum,Molly,sister Kathryn and my Gran Dorothy. My Dad is a farmer.Mummy is a teacher.This morning I came to school on the school bus.When I come home I will watch the television. In the afternoon Gran feeds the calves and takes the dogs for a walk. Mummy gets in at 5 and we have a cooked meal as I have sandwiches for lunch.We will have lamb for dinner left over from Sunday. I live on a farm in a village called Stroat. We have lots of cows on the farm and 4 dogs.
